fresh.body:
I'm reaching out because my client is exploring {{goal}}, and I thought your experience was a strong fit.

The company I represent, Tegus by AlphaSense, is an expert network that facilitates paid consultations between industry professionals and clients.

We would, of course, be happy to compensate you for your time.

What's the best way to connect for 5 minutes? You can grab a time on my calendar or just reply if you'd like the text-based summary first.

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben

fresh_2.body:
I’m working on behalf of a client researching {{goal}}, and I thought you’d be a great fit.

My company Tegus by AlphaSense, is a leading expert network and research platform.

The end goal would be a 30-60 minute compensated call with my client at a rate of your choosing.

Do you have 5 minutes to discuss the project? You can grab time on my calendar, or I can send the details over email.

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben

fresh_3.body:
I’m currently working with a client who is researching {{goal}}. I came across your profile and thought you’d be a great fit for a 30-60 minute call with my client to discuss this topic.

The company I work for, Tegus by AlphaSense, is a leading expert network and research platform.

We’re happy to compensate you at a rate that would make the call worth your time.

Do you have some time to connect? Feel free to check my availability on my calendar, or I can send further information via email.

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben

fresh_4.body:
Just checking in one last time about the project on {{goal}}.

This would be a 30-60 minute paid consultation with our client if selected.

On average, we pay experts between $200-$500 for their time, though happy to pass along a rate that works best for you.

To clarify, our client is not seeking confidential information, only your high-level experiences and opinions.

You can book a time that works for you via my calendar, or I can send the details over email.

If this isn't a good fit, no problem at all. Just let me know, and I won't follow up on this project again.

All the best,
Ben

fresh_5.body:
I wanted to follow up on my previous email about the project on {{goal}}.

The end goal is a 30-60 minute compensated call between you and our client to discuss your personal experiences, nothing non-public or confidential.

If selected, this would be a paid consultation at an hourly rate of your choosing.

To clarify, our client is not seeking confidential information, only your high-level experiences and opinions.

Let me know if you have time to chat or if you’d prefer additional information over email. My calendar is here if that's easier.

If you're not interested, a quick 'no' is always appreciated! If I don't hear back, I'll assume it's not a fit and close the loop on my end.

All the best,
Ben

fresh_6.body:
I’m reaching back out to see if you’d be interested in this project related to {{goal}}. If selected, this would be a 30-60 minute compensated call.

On average, we pay experts between $200-$500 for their time, though happy to pass along a rate that works best for you.

You can book a time that works for you to discuss the project via my calendar or, I can send the information over email.

My clients are not looking for any non-public or confidential information, just for you to share your experience and expertise.

Let me know either way.

All the best,
Ben

backend_pro_first_copy_1.body:
Thanks for being part of our expert community at Tegus by AlphaSense.

I was hoping you could help me or point me in the right direction. We have a client interested in {{goal}}, and I thought you’d be a great fit for this project.

Below are the client’s qualifying questions. Please respond with 1-3 sentences for each so I can recommend your profile to the client.

Is your rate still $400 per hour?

  • Can you speak to the value proposition of your competitors, specifically Omnicom?
  • Can you speak to what is uniquely different about ​your company​ over Omnicom?
  • What are some industry trends that you can speak to?

{{outro}}

All the best,
Ben
